We are proud to be a local and independent small business- owned and operated by Westchase residents (no franchise or corporate owners in sight). Real food from scratch Real food from scratch Real food from scratch Our Cafe delivers way beyond the traditional coffee shop favorites. Enjoy a full menu of breakfast choices, including eggs, omelettes, pancakes, and plenty of healthy options (including gluten free and vegetarian) Be sure to check out our weekend specials, where we go all out to provide you with options that are delicious and different. And for lunch-lovers, we serve a wide variety of salads, sandwiches and flatbreads- all made in house. We're hiring! Let's talk about how you can become part of our team.
